subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: CBS and Turner Broadcasting will pay at least $10.8 billion to carry the tournament through 2024. The field would carry 68 teams if the Division I board of directors approves.
snippet: CBS and Turner Broadcasting will pay at least $10.8 billion to carry the tournament through 2024. The field would carry 68 teams if the Division I board of directors approves.
